 Change Log
 ========

1.0 (15/1/2022)
- First Release

---------------------------------------------------------------

1.0.1 (15/1/2022)
-  Technical fix. Changes to the __init__.py.   No new implementations 


---------------------------------------------------------------

1.0.2 (30/1/2022)
-  A fix to the zooming insets. The parameters for the boolean 'inset' are now set to True. No new implementations
